sn12.44:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the origin and ending of the world.
sn12.44:1.3: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
sn12.44:2.1: “And what, mendicants, is the origin of the world?
sn12.44:2.2: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.44:2.3: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.44:2.4: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.44:2.5: Craving is a condition for grasping.
sn12.44:2.6: Grasping is a condition for continued existence.
sn12.44:2.7: Continued existence is a condition for rebirth.
sn12.44:2.8: Rebirth is a condition for old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress to come to be.
sn12.44:2.9: This is the origin of the world.
sn12.44:3.1: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds. …
sn12.44:3.2: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. …
sn12.44:3.3: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. …
sn12.44:3.4: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. …
sn12.44:3.5: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.44:3.6: Contact is a condition for feeling. …
sn12.44:3.7: Rebirth is a condition for old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress to come to be.
sn12.44:3.8: This is the origin of the world.
sn12.44:4.1: And what is the ending of the world?
sn12.44:4.2: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.44:4.3: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.44:4.4: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.44:4.5: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn12.44:4.6: When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases. …
sn12.44:4.7: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn12.44:4.8: This is the ending of the world.
sn12.44:5.1: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds. …
sn12.44:5.2: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. …
sn12.44:5.3: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. …
sn12.44:5.4: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. …
sn12.44:5.5: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.44:5.6: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.44:5.7: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.44:5.8: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn12.44:5.9: When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases. …
sn12.44:5.10: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn12.44:5.11: This is the ending of the world.”
